Title: #117: Les Parrott—How Conflict Can Help You Win
Description:
Can conflict be a healthy thing? Absolutely. And Les Parrott, renowned author and psychologist, tells how to deal with disagreements in a healthy way, so everyone wins. Dave Ramsey also stops by to share his tips on casting your vision—telling your team where you are going and how you’re going to get there—and why it’s so important to your company.
